comment: I used to think ScreenGeek was a reputable source. Obviously they are not. A SINGLE SOURCE gives a statement from Warner Brothers, in the next line gives a statement from L'Oreal Paris, and in the next line says what Amber Heard's lawyers are going to do. This must be the Warner Brothers L'Oreal Paris Lawyer Publicist. How about "there's much more to these allegations than what's been revealed so far. This is why Amber Heard hasn't settled with Johnny Depp." Excuse me? Amber Heard CAN'T settle with Johnny Depp--because HE is the PLAINTIFF in this case. Lies, lies and more lies. ScreenGeek should be ASHAMED! "Amber still has incredibly damaging evidence against Johnny Depp." Then why did she DROP her allegations of Domestic Abuse rather than turn her evidence over to the Court? The Judge in Amber Heard's Domestic Abuse case dismissed the case WITH PREJUDICE. That means Amber Heard's case was so flawed that she is barred from bringing any action on the Domestic Abuse claim against Johnny Depp permanently. But she still has incredibly damaging evidence that she hid from the Court for WHAT reason. ScreenGeek just published an article that's "SOURCE" was AMBER HEARD. Sure Ms. Heard, who sold her pictures and other questionable evidence to "People Magazine" and "TMZ" for cold, hard cash, is NOW stating "Amber Heard and her legal team have chosen to do everything involving their case in the court rather than rely on social media." EVERYTHING EXCEPT THIS ARTICLE.
